title: Final year backlog
content:
Hello all,
I'm currently in 8th sem and writing a backlog in July, is I fail this exam, what are my options?

comments.body: Don't fail. I think if you fail, you have to write those exams again next year
Adding to this, if you fail the backlog you essentially won't graduate that year, since the only time you can give and pass the course again is next year.
